thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 19 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-AAT Holding Signs Financing Agreements

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AAT Holding Signs Financing Agreements
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - AAT HOLDING SA
* SAID ON FRIDAY THE COMPANY AND ITS UNIT, POLON-ALFA SP. Z O. O., SIGNED 116.2 MILLION ZLOTY CREDIT CONTRACTS WITH BANK ZACHODNI WBK SA AND BANK BGZ BNP PARIBAS SA
* CREDIT TO BE USED FOR REFINANCING OF EXISTING DEBT, PURCHASE OF COMPANYâ€˜S OWN SHARES, INVESTMENT EXPENSES AND GENERAL EXPENSES RELATED TO RUNNING THE COMPANY
* THE COMPANY HAS SIGNED DOCUMENTS WITH SELECTED INVESTORS OBLIGING INVESTORS TO BUY BONDS ISSUED BY THE COMPANY AT TOTAL NOMINAL VALUE OF 33.5 MILLION ZLOTYS
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
